description: The M.E.N. Media application allows you to enjoy the Manchester Evening News, one of the UK’s biggest regional newspapers in terms of readership, directly on your Palm.  From News, Sport and Business to Lifestyle, Showbiz and Health & Beauty; get the very latest from ‘the voice of Greater Manchester’ wherever you are.  The application is easy to use with features such as simple navigation, offline reading, and the ability to share via email.  -------   Do you have an idea that would make the M.E.N. Media app even better? Is there a bug in the app we haven’t seen yet? We want to hear from you! Give us your feedback at: http://menmedia.uservoice.com, on Twitter using the Hashtag: #menmediaapp, or via email at menmedia@spreedinc.com  -------   Features:  News – Business – Sport – Football – Football - Manchester United - Manchester City – Lifestyle – Showbiz - Health and Beauty
